means: 有强烈感情（或意见、想法）的

sentence.Network_en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentence.Network_en: That was the cue for several months of intense bargaining.
sentence.Network_cn: 那意味着几个月的激烈谈判开始了。

sentence.Network_en: The military on both sides are involved in intense activity.
sentence.Network_cn: 双方的武装力量都有密集动作。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... intention n 故意 intense a 强烈的，热烈的 intensify v 变猛烈；加强.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... intend 打算 intense 紧张的 intensity 强度.
背单词的技巧_百度知道 ... intelligible  可理解的，能懂的 intense  强烈的，剧烈的 intensive  仔细的，精细的.
考博英语词汇 ... intend v. 想要，打算；意指 intense a. 强烈的；激烈的；热烈的 intensify v. 加强，加剧；强化；剧化.

list.abs: 医学用语_百度文库 ... pediatric a. 儿科的 intensive a. 加强的；集中的 separate a. 单独的；分离的.
医学用语_百度文库 ... pediatric a. 儿科的 intensive a. 加强的；集中的 separate a. 单独的；分离的.
通名有内涵（intension）有外延（extension）。内涵代表对象的根本属性，外延是名称所适用的对象的集合。
强字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 强调〖 stress;emphasize〗 强度〖 intensity〗 强渡〖 forcedferry〗.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... defective a. 有缺点的；有缺陷的 intensity n. 强烈，剧烈 completion n. 完成，结束；完满.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin intensus 'stretched tightly, strained', past participle of intendere (see intend)

entry.def: Intense is used to describe something that is very great or extreme in strength or degree.

example.ex: He was sweating from the intense heat...
example.tran: 高温酷热让他大汗淋漓。

example.ex: Suddenly the room filled with intense light...
example.tran: 突然,刺眼的强光照亮了整个房间。

entry.def: If you describe an activity as intense, you mean that it is very serious and concentrated, and often involves doing a great deal in a short time.

example.ex: The battle for third place was intense...
example.tran: 第三名的争夺紧张激烈。

example.ex: The military on both sides are involved in intense activity.
example.tran: 双方的武装力量都有密集动作。

entry.tran: (目光)有穿透力的，洞悉一切的
entry.def: If you describe the way someone looks at you as intense, you mean that they look at you very directly and seem to know what you are thinking or feeling.

example.ex: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze...
example.tran: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下,我感到极不自在。

example.ex: He gazed at me with those intense blue eyes.
example.tran: 他用那双深邃的蓝眼睛凝视着我。

entry.def: If you describe a person as intense, you mean that they appear to concentrate very hard on everything that they do, and they feel and show their emotions in a very extreme way.

example.ex: I know he's an intense player, but he does enjoy what he's doing...
example.tran: 我知道他是个拼命三郎,但他确实喜欢自己所做的事。

example.ex: She is taller than I imagined, more adult, more intense.
example.tran: 她比我想象的更高、更成熟、更热切。

auth_sentence.content: Make no msitake, this is an intense album.
auth_sentence.res_content: Make no msitake, this is an intense album.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Make no msitake, this is an intense album.

auth_sentence.content: I had a very intense church experience growing up.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had a very intense church experience growing up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had a very intense church experience growing up.

auth_sentence.content: The first six months were incredibly intense but rewarding.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first six months were incredibly intense but rewarding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first six months were incredibly intense but rewarding.

Sentence.sentence: But individual choices have an intense cumulative (累积的) effect.
Disputes were characterized by intense verbal ( 言语上的) aggression, tended to be repeated and not resolved and made men, more than women, extremely angry

means.word_mean: 强烈的, 剧烈的; 极端的

sentences.en: Susan was an intense young lady.
sentences.cn: 苏珊是一个热情的年轻姑娘。

sentences.en: Her dislike for Dick was intense.
sentences.cn: 她对迪克怀有强烈的憎恶。

sentences.en: The patient has an intense will to recover.
sentences.cn: 那个病人热切地希望恢复健康。

sentences.en: I find her exhausting to be with—she's too intense.
sentences.cn: 我感到和她在一起很累, 她这个人太热情了。

jushi.english: The patient has an intense will to recover.
jushi.chinese: 那个病人热切地希望恢复健康。

jushi.english: She's a very intense person who cares deeply about everything.
jushi.chinese: 她是一个非常热心的人,对每一件事情都极为关切。

jushi.english: Susan was an intense young lady.
jushi.chinese: 苏珊是一个热情的年轻姑娘。
